Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
HI THERE. I am posting on the blog because I was asked to, and because the showings just aren’t enough.

I’m not really sure what I should be saying but it’s pretty darn sweet that the club has its own blog now, and an awesome Arakawa banner to boot…

I guess I’d just like to say again that I’m excited as all get out for Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya. I loved the first season and the second was… good… I guess. Cough. But yeah. Looking forward to Asahina’s PLOT YOU KNOW WHAT I’M SAYIN’.

Replies.Author: CSM Anime Club
Replies.Content: YEAH MAN I KNOW WHAT YA SAYIN’
